dashboard.description: Complete observability dashboard: pipeline status, resource utilization (CPU/RAM/Disk), per-equipment analysis, and performance profiling

options.content:
## ACM Observability Dashboard

**How to read this dashboard:**
- **Top Row**: Executive summary - total runs, success/failure counts, peak resource usage
- **System Resources**: Global CPU, RAM, Disk I/O across all equipment and runs
- **Per-Module Breakdown**: Which ACM modules (startup, load_data, fit.pca, fusion, etc.) consume the most resources
- **Per-Equipment Analysis**: Resource consumption breakdown by equipment - useful for identifying problematic equipment
- **Per-Run Analysis**: Drill down into specific runs using the Run ID filter to see exactly what happened

**Filters**: Use **Equipment** to focus on specific equipment, **Section/Module** for specific pipeline stages, **Run ID** for individual run analysis.

**Color coding**: ðŸŸ¢ Green = healthy, ðŸŸ¡ Yellow = warning, ðŸŸ  Orange = high, ðŸ”´ Red = critical
